entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
